questions.questionText: which of the following does TypeScript use to specify types?
questions.explaination: Ts uses a colon(:) to separate the property name from the property type

questions.questionText: How else can Array<number> be written in TypeScript?
questions.explaination: number[] is another way of writing Array<number> in TypeScript

questions.questionText: which is not an access modifier?
questions.explaination: static is not an access modifier
